content:
I just opened #6377, but realize I should have probably posted here first.
We've gotten the request to be able to clear one's initial test messages several times now, from realm admins setting up their realm.
What would folks think of something in org settings that allows you to delete all your organization's messages?
@Rishi Gupta I think that's fine, but we should limit it to realms with <N messages, for some N~250, and if they have more than that, suggest they contact support to make sure they really mean it.
Just because I think we want it to be really hard to mass-delete everything.

We should be thoughtful about the specification: I think it should delete (using the same Archive approach we use for other message deletions, so one can recover if it happens accidentally) the messages sent by the human users; presumably we don't want to delete the bot messages. and have a confirmation dialog.
agreed with all of those. By "not delete bot messages" I think you mean "not delete system bot messages"? If they set up a test integration presumably those messages should get deleted too.
